Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar

Interface Area

All Known Subinterfaces:
ConvexShape, Shape
All Known Implementing Classes:
Circle, IntBox, IntOctagon, PolygonShape, PolylineArea, PolylineShape, RegularTileShape, Simplex, TileShape
public interface Area
An Area is a not necessarily simply connected Shape, which means, that it may contain holes. The border and the holes of an Area are of class Shape.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IntBox
    bounding_box()
    Returns the smallest surrounding box of the area.
    IntOctagon
    bounding_octagon()
    Returns the smallest surrounding octagon of the area.
    boolean
    contains(FloatPoint p_point)
    Returns true, if p_point is contained in this area, but not inside a hole.
    boolean
    contains(Point p_point)
    Returns true, if p_point is inside or on the border of this area, but not inside a hole.
    FloatPoint[]
    corner_approx_arr()
    Returns an approximation of the corners of this area.
    int
    dimension()
    returns 2, if the area contains 2 dimensional shapes , 1, if it contains curves, 0, if it is reduced to a points and -1, if it is empty.
    Shape
    get_border()
    returns the border shape of this area
    Shape[]
    get_holes()
    Returns the array of holes, of this area.
    boolean
    is_bounded()
    returns true, if the area is contained in a sufficiently large box
    boolean
    is_contained_in(IntBox p_box)
    Checks, if this area is completely contained in p_box.
    boolean
    is_empty()
    returns true, if the area is empty
    Area
    mirror_horizontal(IntPoint p_pole)
    Mirrors this area at the horizontal line through p_pole.
    Area
    mirror_vertical(IntPoint p_pole)
    Mirrors this area at the vertical line through p_pole.
    FloatPoint
    nearest_point_approx(FloatPoint p_from_point)
    Calculates an approximation of the nearest point of the shape to p_from_point
    Area
    rotate_approx(double p_angle, FloatPoint p_pole)
    Rotates the area around p_pole by p_angle.
    TileShape[]
    split_to_convex()
    Returns a division of this area into convex pieces.
    Area
    translate_by(Vector p_vector)
    Returns the affine translation of the area by p_vector
    Area
    turn_90_degree(int p_factor, IntPoint p_pole)
    Turns this area by p_factor times 90 degree around p_pole.

  • Method Details

    • is_empty

      boolean is_empty()
      returns true, if the area is empty

    • is_bounded

      boolean is_bounded()
      returns true, if the area is contained in a sufficiently large box

    • dimension

      int dimension()
      returns 2, if the area contains 2 dimensional shapes , 1, if it contains curves, 0, if it is reduced to a points and -1, if it is empty.

    • is_contained_in

      boolean is_contained_in(IntBox p_box)
      Checks, if this area is completely contained in p_box.

    • get_border

      Shape get_border()
      returns the border shape of this area

    • get_holes

      Shape[] get_holes()
      Returns the array of holes, of this area.

    • bounding_box

      IntBox bounding_box()
      Returns the smallest surrounding box of the area. If the area is not bounded, some coordinates of the resulting box may be equal Integer.MAX_VALUE

    • bounding_octagon

      IntOctagon bounding_octagon()
      Returns the smallest surrounding octagon of the area. If the area is not bounded, some coordinates of the resulting octagon may be equal Integer.MAX_VALUE

    • contains

      boolean contains(FloatPoint p_point)
      Returns true, if p_point is contained in this area, but not inside a hole. Being on the border is not defined for FloatPoints because of numerical inaccuracy.

    • contains

      boolean contains(Point p_point)
      Returns true, if p_point is inside or on the border of this area, but not inside a hole.

    • nearest_point_approx

      FloatPoint nearest_point_approx(FloatPoint p_from_point)
      Calculates an approximation of the nearest point of the shape to p_from_point

    • turn_90_degree

      Area turn_90_degree(int p_factor, IntPoint p_pole)
      Turns this area by p_factor times 90 degree around p_pole.

    • rotate_approx

      Area rotate_approx(double p_angle, FloatPoint p_pole)
      Rotates the area around p_pole by p_angle. The result may be not exact.

    • translate_by

      Area translate_by(Vector p_vector)
      Returns the affine translation of the area by p_vector

    • mirror_horizontal

      Area mirror_horizontal(IntPoint p_pole)
      Mirrors this area at the horizontal line through p_pole.

    • mirror_vertical

      Area mirror_vertical(IntPoint p_pole)
      Mirrors this area at the vertical line through p_pole.

    • corner_approx_arr

      FloatPoint[] corner_approx_arr()
      Returns an approximation of the corners of this area.

    • split_to_convex

      TileShape[] split_to_convex()
      Returns a division of this area into convex pieces.
